Container.Name: Jupyter-TensorFlow_OpenCV
Container.Overview:
Unraid compatible Jupyter Notebook (Python kernel) container with CPU-ready Tensorflow, OpenCV, Pandas, PyTorch -- based on datamachines/tensorflow_opencv
The default password to access Jupyter is dmc
This is the CPU-bound container's version. The GPU equivalent container is named Jupyter-CuDNN_TensorFlow_OpenCV Please note that the container images is large at over 4GB and its GPU counterpart runs over 16GB.
The system is ran as the jupyter user (has sudo privileges) and /dmc is where you can place your weights and other files to support your development.
VERSION (match datamachines/tensorflow_opencv releases date) 20220318 with support for TensorFlow 2.8.0 and OpenCV 4.5.5
